sk1.name: Venomous Gale
sk1.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

sk2.name: Poison Sting
sk2.desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

sk3.name: Plague Ward
sk3.desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50%% of the full damage.

sk4.name: Poison Nova
sk4.desc: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova's effect cannot bring units below 1 HP.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
